<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Equalizer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=220)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Certain Strike</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are a master with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

This small iron band has a shifting weight that helps equalize the affixed weapon’s balance. When you activate it, you use [Certain Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=397), as the fighter feat. You must meet the normal requirements, including those of the press trait.

 If you have the Certain Strike feat, the failure effect increases to deal the weapon’s normal damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Iron Equalizer
requirement: You are a master with the affixed weapon
